CustomField.formula: IF( process_isBinderJetting__c , 'Binder Jetting: ', '') + IF( process_isCarbon__c , 'Carbon: ', '') + IF( process_isCNC_Machining__c ,'CNC Machining: ', '') + IF( process_isDie_Casting__c ,'Die Casting: ', '') + IF( process_isDMLS__c ,'DMLS: ', '') + IF( process_isDirect_Sourced__c ,'Direct Sourced: ', '') + IF( process_isExtrusion__c ,'Extrusion: ', '') + IF( process_isFDM__c , 'FDM: ', '') + IF( process_isHPMultJetFusion__c ,'HP Multi Jet Fusion: ','') + IF( (process_isInjection_Molding__c || process_isInjectionMoldingTool__c),'Injection Molding: ','') + IF( process_isPolyJet_3D__c ,'PolyJet 3D: ','') + IF( process_isSLS__c ,'SLS: ','') + IF( process_isSheet_metal__c ,'Sheet Metal: ','') + IF( process_isStamping__c ,'Stamping: ','') + IF( process_isSLA__c , 'SLA: ','') + IF( process_isUrethane_Casting__c ,'Urethane Casting: ','')
CustomField.label: Manufacturing Process
